verses.verse: בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> Ye [are] the children אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> you לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִתְגֹּֽדְד֗וּ <S%H1413><s%> ye shall not cut וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תָשִׂ֧ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> yourselves nor make קָרְחָ֛ה <S%H7144><s%> any baldness בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between עֵינֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> between your eyes לָמֵֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> for the dead

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> For thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> you לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וּבְךָ֞ בָּחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> hath chosen יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD לִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לוֹ֙ לְעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <S%H5459><s%> thee to be a peculiar מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> unto himself above all the nations אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> are on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [are] upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> the earth ס
לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> Thou shalt not eat כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any תּוֹעֵבָֽה׃ <S%H8441><s%> any abominable thing

זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> These [are] the beasts אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תֹּאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> which ye shall eat שׁ֕וֹר <S%H7794><s%> the ox שֵׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> lesser כְשָׂבִ֖ים <S%H3775><s%> lamb וְשֵׂ֥ה <S%H7716><s%> lesser עִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> and the goat

אַיָּ֥ל <S%H354><s%> The hart וּצְבִ֖י <S%H6643><s%> and the roebuck וְיַחְמ֑וּר <S%H3180><s%> and the fallow deer וְאַקּ֥וֹ <S%H689><s%> and the wild goat וְדִישֹׁ֖ן <S%H1788><s%> and the pygarg וּתְא֥וֹ <S%H8377><s%> and the wild ox וָזָֽמֶר׃ <S%H2169><s%> and the chamois

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Any בְּהֵמָ֞ה <S%H929><s%> And every beast מַפְרֶ֣סֶת <S%H6536><s%> that parteth פַּרְסָ֗ה <S%H6541><s%> the hoof וְשֹׁסַ֤עַת <S%H8156><s%> the cleft שֶׁ֙סַע֙ <S%H8157><s%> and cleaveth שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> into two פְרָס֔וֹת <S%H6541><s%> claws מַעֲלַ֥ת <S%H5927><s%> [and] cheweth גֵּרָ֖ה <S%H1625><s%> the cud בַּבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> among the beasts אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> that ye shall eat

אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> Nevertheless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֞ה <S%H2088><s%> of these לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> are not תֹֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> Nevertheless these ye shall not eat מִמַּֽעֲלֵ֣י <S%H5927><s%> of them that chew הַגֵּרָ֔ה <S%H1625><s%> the cud וּמִמַּפְרִיסֵ֥י <S%H6536><s%> or of them that divide הַפַּרְסָ֖ה <S%H6541><s%> hoof הַשְּׁסוּעָ֑ה <S%H8156><s%> the cloven אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֠גָּמָל <S%H1581><s%> [as] the camel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאַרְנֶ֨בֶת <S%H768><s%> and the hare וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁפָ֜ן <S%H8227><s%> and the coney כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מַעֲלֵ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> for they chew גֵרָ֣ה <S%H1625><s%> the cud הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וּפַרְסָה֙ <S%H6541><s%> not the hoof לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not הִפְרִ֔יסוּ <S%H6536><s%> but divide טְמֵאִ֥ים <S%H2931><s%> [therefore] they [are] unclean הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like לָכֶֽם׃

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֠חֲזִיר <S%H2386><s%> And the swine כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מַפְרִ֨יס <S%H6536><s%> because it divideth פַּרְסָ֥ה <S%H6541><s%> the hoof הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor גֵרָ֔ה <S%H1625><s%> yet cheweth not the cud טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> it [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶ֑ם מִבְּשָׂרָם֙ <S%H1320><s%> of their flesh לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> unto you ye shall not eat וּבְנִבְלָתָ֖ם <S%H5038><s%> their dead carcase לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִגָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5060><s%> nor touch ס

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> These תֹּֽאכְל֔וּ <S%H398><s%> These ye shall eat מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of all that [are] in the waters כֹּ֧ל <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֛וֹ סְנַפִּ֥יר <S%H5579><s%> all that have fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> and scales תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> shall ye eat

וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> anything אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> that אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> have ל֛וֹ סְנַפִּ֥יר <S%H5579><s%> And whatsoever hath not fins וְקַשְׂקֶ֖שֶׂת <S%H7193><s%> and scales לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> ye may not eat טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> it [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶֽם׃ ס
כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any צִפּ֥וֹר <S%H6833><s%> birds טְהֹרָ֖ה <S%H2889><s%> [Of] all clean תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> ye shall eat

וְזֶ֕ה <S%H2088><s%> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> But these [are they] of which ye shall not eat מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like הַנֶּ֥שֶׁר <S%H5404><s%> the eagle וְהַפֶּ֖רֶס <S%H6538><s%> and the ossifrage וְהָֽעָזְנִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5822><s%> and the ospray
וְהָרָאָה֙ <S%H7201><s%> And the glede וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָ֣אַיָּ֔ה <S%H344><s%> and the kite וְהַדַּיָּ֖ה <S%H1772><s%> and the vulture לְמִינָֽהּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind
וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every עֹרֵ֖ב <S%H6158><s%> And every raven לְמִינֽוֹ׃ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> בַּ֣ת <S%H1323><s%> first הַֽיַּעֲנָ֔ה <S%H3284><s%> and the ostrich וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתַּחְמָ֖ס <S%H8464><s%> and the night hawk וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁ֑חַף <S%H7828><s%> and the cuckow וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנֵּ֖ץ <S%H5322><s%> and the hawk לְמִינֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4327><s%> after his kind
אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכּ֥וֹס <S%H3563><s%> The little owl וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּנְשׁ֖וּף <S%H3244><s%> and the great owl וְהַתִּנְשָֽׁמֶת׃ <S%H8580><s%> and the swan
וְהַקָּאָ֥ת <S%H6893><s%> And the pelican וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָחָ֖מָה <S%H7360><s%> and the gier eagle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁלָֽךְ׃ <S%H7994><s%> and the cormorant

וְהַ֣חֲסִידָ֔ה <S%H2624><s%> And the stork וְהָאֲנָפָ֖ה <S%H601><s%> and the heron לְמִינָ֑הּ <S%H4327><s%> after her kind וְהַדּוּכִיפַ֖ת <S%H1744><s%> and the lapwing וְהָעֲטַלֵּֽף׃ <S%H5847><s%> and the bat

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all שֶׁ֣רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> And every creeping thing הָע֔וֹף <S%H5775><s%> that flieth טָמֵ֥א <S%H2931><s%> [is] unclean ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶ֑ם לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵאָכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> unto you they shall not be eaten
כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any ע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> fowls טָה֖וֹר <S%H2889><s%> [But of] all clean תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> ye may eat

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> Ye shall not eat כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything נְ֠בֵלָה <S%H5038><s%> [of] any thing that dieth of itself לַגֵּ֨ר <S%H1616><s%> it unto the stranger אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֜יךָ <S%H8179><s%> that [is] in thy gates תִּתְּנֶ֣נָּה <S%H5414><s%> thou shalt give וַאֲכָלָ֗הּ <S%H398><s%> that he may eat א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מָכֹר֙ <S%H4376><s%> it or thou mayest sell לְנָכְרִ֔י <S%H5237><s%> it unto an alien כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> for thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> you לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְבַשֵּׁ֥ל <S%H1310><s%> Thou shalt not seethe גְּדִ֖י <S%H1423><s%> a kid בַּחֲלֵ֥ב <S%H2461><s%> milk אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> in his mother's פ

עַשֵּׂ֣ר <S%H6237><s%> Thou shalt truly תְּעַשֵּׂ֔ר <S%H6237><s%> tithe אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תְּבוּאַ֣ת <S%H8393><s%> all the increase זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <S%H2233><s%> of thy seed הַיֹּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> bringeth forth הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> that the field שָׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> year שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> by year

וְאָכַלְתָּ֞ <S%H398><s%> And thou shalt eat לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בַּמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> he יִבְחַר֮ <S%H977><s%> which he shall choose לְשַׁכֵּ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> to place שְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> in it מַעְשַׂ֤ר <S%H4643><s%> there the tithe דְּגָֽנְךָ֙ <S%H1715><s%> of thy corn תִּֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <S%H8492><s%> of thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֔ךָ <S%H3323><s%> and of thine oil וּבְכֹרֹ֥ת <S%H1062><s%> and the firstlings בְּקָרְךָ֖ <S%H1241><s%> of thy herds וְצֹאנֶ֑ךָ <S%H6629><s%> and of thy flocks לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> so תִּלְמַ֗ד <S%H3925><s%> that thou mayest learn לְיִרְאָ֛ה <S%H3372><s%> to fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> always

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for thee so that יִרְבֶּ֨ה <S%H7235><s%> be too long מִמְּךָ֜ <S%H4480><s%> at הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> And if the way כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> since לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> you are not תוּכַל֮ <S%H3201><s%> thou art not able שְׂאֵתוֹ֒ <S%H5375><s%> to carry כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when יִרְחַ֤ק <S%H7368><s%> be too far מִמְּךָ֙ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> it [or] if the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after יִבְחַר֙ <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> from thee which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לָשׂ֥וּם <S%H7760><s%> to set שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> in it כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> If יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> there when the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

וְנָתַתָּ֖ה <S%H5414><s%> Then shalt thou turn בַּכָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [it] into money וְצַרְתָּ֤ <S%H6887><s%> adversary הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> the money בְּיָ֣דְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand וְהָֽלַכְתָּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> and shalt go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֛ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בּֽוֹ׃

וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt bestow הַכֶּ֡סֶף <S%H3701><s%> that money בְּכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after תְּאַוֶּ֨ה <S%H183><s%> lusteth after נַפְשְׁךָ֜ <S%H5315><s%> for whatsoever thy soul בַּבָּקָ֣ר <S%H1241><s%> for oxen וּבַצֹּ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> or for sheep וּבַיַּ֙יִן֙ <S%H3196><s%> or for wine וּבַשֵּׁכָ֔ר <S%H7941><s%> or for strong drink וּבְכֹ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after תִּֽשְׁאָלְךָ֖ <S%H7592><s%> desireth נַפְשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H5315><s%> or for whatsoever thy soul וְאָכַ֣לְתָּ <S%H398><s%> and thou shalt eat שָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> and there לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> there before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֖ <S%H8055><s%> and thou shalt rejoice אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1004><s%> thou and thine household

וְהַלֵּוִ֥י <S%H3881><s%> And the Levite אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H8179><s%> that [is] within thy gates לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַֽעַזְבֶ֑נּוּ <S%H5800><s%> thou shalt not forsake כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> has ל֛וֹ חֵ֥לֶק <S%H2506><s%> him for he hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> nor inheritance עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> among ס

מִקְצֵ֣ה ׀ <S%H7097><s%> At the end שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> of three שָׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> years תּוֹצִיא֙ <S%H3318><s%> thou shalt bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעְשַׂר֙ <S%H4643><s%> all the tithe תְּבוּאָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H8393><s%> of thine increase בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> the same year הַהִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> and shalt וְהִנַּחְתָּ֖ <S%H3240><s%> and shalt lay [it] up בִּשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8179><s%> within thy gates

וּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> shall come הַלֵּוִ֡י <S%H3881><s%> And the Levite כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> has לוֹ֩ חֵ֨לֶק <S%H2506><s%> (because he hath no part וְנַחֲלָ֜ה <S%H5159><s%> nor inheritance עִמָּ֗ךְ <S%H5973><s%> among וְ֠הַגֵּר <S%H1616><s%> with thee) and the stranger וְהַיָּת֤וֹם <S%H3490><s%> and the fatherless וְהָֽאַלְמָנָה֙ <S%H490><s%> and the widow אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> which [are] within thy gates וְאָכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> and shall eat וְשָׂבֵ֑עוּ <S%H7646><s%> and be satisfied לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> order יְבָרֶכְךָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> may bless יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> thee in all the work יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> which thou doest ס
